// Garmin ConnectIQ dialogs The WheelLog App used with this application is not installed on your ConnectIQ device. Please install the widget and try again. The ConnectIQ service is unavailable.
// Other Unknown device Bluetooth LE is not supported Bluetooth is not supported on your device. Unable to initialize Bluetooth, exiting Bluetooth is required and was not successfully enabled. Please wait! Connecting to Wheel‚Ä¶ Press BACK again to exit Scan Stop Connect Connecting Searching Disconnected Connected Connection Failed Disconnect Connect to Wheel Disconnect from Wheel Wheel Disconnected Connecting to Wheel‚Ä¶ Searching for Wheel‚Ä¶ Wheel Connected Waiting for device Start Pebble Dash Show settings menu Stop Pebble Dash Start Logging Stop Logging Started logging to %1$s Detected wheel protocol %1$s Search for Wheel Scanning‚Ä¶ Devices Beginner Expert Normal Waiting for wheel‚Ä¶ Smart BMS is not detected Speed Avg Speed Avg Riding Top Speed Max Temp Max Power Battery Motor output CPU load Max Current Charging Distance Wheel Distance User Distance Journey Time Ride Time Voltage Voltage Sag Current Power System temp Second temp PWM Max PWM Tilt Roll Fan Status Mode Total Distance Torque Speed Limit Current Limit CPU temp IMU temp Motor Power Total Name Model Version Serial Number Charge Time ‚Ä¢ %1$.1f km/h ‚Ä¢ %2$d%% ‚Ä¢ %3$d¬∞C ‚Ä¢ %4$.1f km ‚Ä¢ Notify Default Notify Watch Icon Logging Icon Connection Icon Connection lost at %1s Enable Auto Upload? Automatic uploading while not connected to WiFi will use your mobile data. This may result in charges from your network provider if you do not have a data plan. No permission to write to external storage. Logging cancelled. External storage is unavailable. Logging cancelled. Log location was requested but no permission to location data was provided. No location data will be logged. Location logging using GPS was requested but GPS is disabled. Location will be logged using Network data. Location logging using GSM Network was requested but this location provider is disabled. No location data will be logged. Location has been disabled within Android. No location data will be logged. Raw Distance Speed alarm triggered Current alarm triggered Temperature alarm triggered Garmin ConnectIQ Enable connectivity to Garmin ConnectIQ Horn Mode Executed when the select button on the Pebble watch is pressed Tiltback speed Wheel speed limit 1st Alert Speed 2nd Alert Speed 3rd Alert Speed 4 beeps alarm 3 beeps alarm 2 beeps alarm Pedals Mode Leds mode Strobe Mode Light Mode On/Off On/Off/Auto On Off Charging Discharging Auto Strobe Disabled Enabled Hard Medium Soft On-board (KingSong) Via bluetooth audio Application Settings Log Settings Alarm Settings Watch Preferences Wheel Settings Reset top speed and PWM Reset battery sag Reset user distance Edit MAC address Edit profile name About WheelLog Settings A N*m Top limit of outer dial
The maximum number shown on the outer dial (speed or current) Use MPH Show speed in miles rather than kilometers view_blocks_string Start MiBand Alert Info blocks Show info blocks below speedometer Restart required Please restart the application to apply the language change English Use English language instead of Android system language Improved percents Use better formula for battery percents calculation instead of wheel vendor formula Fixed percents. Use fixed formula for battery percents calculation instead of wheel vendor formula. Tiltback voltage. Voltage per 1 cell, where the wheel tiltback the pedals. Enable Picture-in-Picture Use Picture-in-Picture mode instead of going to background Current on main dial Draw current on main dial instead of speed Connect sound Play sound when Wheel connects or disconnects Connection lost beeps period Period of beeps when connection lost, 0sec - no beeps Auto mute Auto mute at speeds below 7 km/h Battery capacity Battery Capacity in Wh Charging power Charging Power in A Show Bluetooth without name. Show Bluetooth devices without name. Sound of connection. Sound of connection to the wheel. Enable Alarms Allow the phone to vibrate as a warning Disable Phone Vibration Phone will not vibrate but the alarm will be passed to a connected Watch/Band Disable Phone Beep Phone will not beep but the alarm will be passed to a connected Watch/Band Altered alarms Use altered alarms model based on voltage and capabilities of wheel Altered alarms options Rotation speed Rotation (lift-up) speed of your wheel Rotation voltage Voltage at which rotation speed was measured Power factor Don't change if you don't understand what is that, default=90 First alarm PWM Calculated PWM on which first alarm should occur Second alarm PWM Should be higher than first alarm Third alarm PWM Should be higher than second alarm Advance warning Advance speed warning, 0 - off Advance warning PWM Advance PWM warning, 0 - off Frequency of warnings Notification period, 0 - off Short display of PWM. Current/Max PWM is displayed at about speed. Speed Alarm 1 Speed that triggers the alarm Speed Alarm 2 Speed Alarm 3 Battery Percent Battery percent that activates the alarm Battery Percent Battery Percent Current Alarm Current Current that triggers the alarm Temperature Alarm Temperature Temperature that triggers the alarm speed current No data available Auto Log Start logging automatically when a wheel is connected Upload to electro.club Automatically upload log files to electro.club site. GPS must be turned on. Auto Upload Logs Automatically upload log files to Google Drive Log location Include location data within the logs Use GPS for location Use GPS for location rather than network provider. GPS is more accurate but may consume more battery power Off/On/Strobe Soft/Medium/Hard Alarm settings Alarm Mode Calibration My Wheel is a Gotway MCM If your wheel is Gotway MCM, and it shows wrong speed, distance and others parameters, it should make them normal Wrong 18L distanse 18L use to show wrong distance, WheelLog corrects this number, but if you want to see wrong raw numbers from wheel - check this Battery voltage 67V/84V/100V Negative current and speed mode When you riding straight if speed and currents negative - try change to opposite setting, or choose absolute Absolute (only positive) Reverse Straight 35 km/h + 80% PWM 80% PWM only 30 + 35 km/h + 80% PWM m Switch on the light Activate headlight Switch on wheel illumination Activate leds on the sides Disable handle button Wheel will not disable when you press the button on the handle Speaker volume Change built-in speaker volume Pedals Horizontal pedals adjustment Wheel settings for Ninebot Z not available yet V W Battery 1 Battery 2 S/N FW Factory capacity Actual capacity Full cycles Charge count Mfg date Status Remain capacity Percent Current Voltage Temp 1 Temp 2 Health Cell 1 Cell 2 Cell 3 Cell 4 Cell 5 Cell 6 Cell 7 Cell 8 Cell 9 Cell 10 Cell 11 Cell 12 Cell 13 Cell 14 Cell 15 Cell 16 Password Email reconnect_option Wheel reconnects if error or no data update Auto Reconnect Speed alarm at %1$.0f k/h Current alarm at %1$.0f A Temperature alarm at %1$d¬∞C show_page_events Show the events page Events page Main view
